definition: lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: Objective To analyse the etiological and clinical features of the epididymal mass.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討附睾腫塊的病因及臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Results Macroscopically, the tumor appeared as a hard grayish-white mass.
sentences.chinese: 結果大體檢查腫瘤呈質硬灰白色腫塊。

sentences.english: Osteoma should be included in the differential diagnosis of calcified masses in cerebellopontine angle.
sentences.chinese: 在小腦橋腦角之鈣化腫塊，骨瘤必須列入鑑別診斷。

sentences.english: Methods The data of39cases with appendiceal mass was analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回首分析我院闌尾炎性腫塊39例。

sentences.english: Smooth, well-demarcated lumps are usually benign.
sentences.chinese: 光滑，界限清楚的腫塊通常是良性的。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the X-ray diagnostic value of pulmonary hilar mass.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高對肺門腫塊X線診斷重要性的認識。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of CT diagnosing intraluminal masses of small intestine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小腸腔內腫塊性病變的CT診斷價值。

sentences.english: One day, her accident's has a rack size tumour tracing to under abdomen that.
sentences.chinese: 一天，她意外的摸到下腹那有一個架子大小的腫塊。

sentences.english: The Liposarco-rna always showed inhomogeneous density mass accompanied with lytic bone destruction.
sentences.chinese: 脂肪肉瘤腫塊密度不均勻和溶骨性骨質破壞。

sentences.english: The raised bumps on the white grain represent the sites of insertion for the sea urchin’s spines.
sentences.chinese: 白色顆粒上突起的腫塊就是海膽脊柱的着生部位。

sentences.english: But when the lump is still there a week later, you consult your doctor.
sentences.chinese: 但當一個星期後腫塊仍然存在，你就去諮詢醫生了。

sentences.english: When palpable upper abdominal mass fashion with transverse colon or differentiated pancreatic mass.
sentences.chinese: 當上腹部摸到腫塊時尚須與橫結腸或胰腺腫塊相區別。

sentences.english: When palpable upper abdominal mass fashion with transverse colon or differentiated pancreatic mass.
sentences.chinese: 當上腹部摸到腫塊時尚須與橫結腸或胰腺腫塊相區別。

sentences.english: Now, microwave technology, offered by Covidien, removes the tumor with intense heat.
sentences.chinese: 現在，微波技術利用強熱消除腫塊。

sentences.english: The outer-bone soft tissue masses were demonstrated in the majority cases with discontinuous bone shell.
sentences.chinese: 骨外軟組織腫塊多出現在骨殼斷續或不完整的病例。
